results.doc_title: YF Retail Customer Order Metadata - Merged Sheet
results.purpose: Master assumptions and metadata management for all retail customers, feeding into ODS (Operational Data Store) and weekly sales reporting
key_data_points: ODS refreshes hourly with this data
Edit window restriction: avoid last 15 minutes of each hour to prevent data sync issues
Tab 1: Customer mapping with details (columns A-E), payment info (column G), retail finance mapping (columns H-K), sales team mapping (columns L-Z)
Tab 2: Flags new customers missing from Tab 1, refreshes overnight
24% abandonment rate on signup page (from meeting notes)
Q1 OKR deadline: February 9th for CVR program micro-conversion targets

entities.name: ODS (Operational Data Store)
entities.context: Primary data destination that syncs hourly with the retail customer metadata

entities.name: Retail Finance
entities.context: Uses mapping in orange columns (H-K) for weekly retail revenue data and calculations

entities.name: Sales Team
entities.context: Uses mapping in blue columns (L-Z) for customer data

entities.name: Prateek Jajoo
entities.context: Working on signup page optimization, CVR program, and Project LEGO implementation

entities.name: Nikita Gorshkov
entities.context: Leading CVR program, setting Q1 OKRs for micro-conversion targets by Feb 9th

entities.name: The Pets Table (TPT)
entities.context: Active development with 18 open PRs focusing on funnel navigation, portions, add-ons, and PDP improvements

entities.name: Factor Form (RTEVMS)
entities.context: OTP (One-Time Purchase) launch in UAT with multiple pricing, copy, and discount issues flagged

entities.name: Project LEGO
entities.context: Implementation for social login and potential unified layout across Good Shop and Pet Stable

insights: Critical operational constraint: 15-minute editing blackout each hour to prevent ODS sync conflicts
Two-tab workflow: Tab 1 for active customer metadata, Tab 2 for overnight detection of new customers
Data feeds multiple downstream systems with different mapping requirements (finance vs sales)
High-priority issues in Factor Form OTP launch: incorrect free shipping threshold, 0% discount display for Whey/Hydration products
CVR program focus: reducing 24% abandonment rate through passwordless login and CTA optimization
The Pets Table has significant development velocity with 18 concurrent PRs covering funnel improvements, portions logic, and add-ons migration
Cross-functional dependencies: DAS team involvement needed for Q1 OKR definition by Feb 9th
